title: So, DFG will be removed while Annie will be buffed. And we know Sona will be nerfed again.
body: There is a conflict of interests if these are made nearly at the same time no?

replies.body:
We know that?

The movespeed ding and the lower power on her Staccato (try Diminuendo instead for trading, seriously) will probably be enough to bring her in line.
Or take her down into the shitter. Which is exactly where she is going to be.
